episodes.title: Finance Employee Sells 200,000 Self-Published Romance Novels
episodes.author: Chris Guillebeau / Onward Project / Panoply
episodes.summary:
When she can’t find anything good to read, a finance employee starts writing romance novels of her own. The books go on to sell hundreds of thousands of copies and pull her family out of debt.

Side Hustle School features a new story EVERY DAY of someone who started a hustle without quitting their job. You’ll learn how they got the idea, how they overcame challenges along the way, and what the results are. You need a hustle!
